hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "The reciting of the Zabur (i.e. Psalms) was made easy for David. He used to order that his riding animals be saddled, and would finish reciting the Zabur before they were saddled. And he would never eat except from the earnings of his manual work

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {وَآتَيْنَا دَاوُدَ زَبُورًا}
chapter.eng-name: The Statement of Allah Taa'la: "And to David We gave the Zabur..."
